title: Maximizing Your IRA Distributions: How Charity Contributions Can Save You on Taxes
subtitle: Discover how donating IRA distributions to charity can eliminate tax liabilities and benefit both you and the charity.
content:
Yep. Looks like you'll be retiring with $2 million in your traditional IRA.

Yep. Can't wait to get our taxes from those distributions. You will owe us nothing.

What did you find this time? I'm donating the distributions to a qualified charity of my choice.

Do you consider us a charity? I've given you enough charity throughout my life.

Besides, if I donate to charity, it takes care of my distribution, it doesn't trigger any taxes, and if I donate stock, the capital gains resets for the charity.

I win, charity wins. And you? We lose. That's right.
